pages.text: $(li)The Ring of Health adds you an extra heart of life.$(br)$(li)It can only be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_keep)Ruined Keep$(/l).$(br)$(li)This ring can't be equipped, you have to hold it in your offhand to active its effects.
